readabilityObject.title: COVID-19 vaccine Archives
readabilityObject.content:
COVID Vaccine Booster Doses

Everyone should get a booster dose after completing their primary COVID vaccination series.

Are Your COVID Vaccines Up To Date?

For the best protection against COVID, make sure your COVID vaccines are up to date.

COVID-19 Vaccination Questions and Answers

By Vincent Iannelli, MD / December 31, 2021 / anaphylaxis, answers, COVID-19 vaccine, early dose, grace period, late dose, mutant strains, questions, questions about vaccines, repeating vaccines, second dose, shedding, side effects, spike protein, titer testing, VAERS

We have all of the answers to your questions about the COVID-19 vaccines.

Understanding the New COVID Quarantine and Isolation Recommendations

By Vincent Iannelli, MD / December 29, 2021 / booster doses, COVID-19, COVID-19 vaccine, exposures, isolation, Omicron, PCR, quarantine, rapid antigen tests

We have new quarantine and isolation recommendations from the CDC for folks who are exposed or test positive for COVID.
